name: Connected Caverns
description:
A game made for the GMTK 2021 game jam with the theme "Joined Together". 

"Connected Caverns" is a puzzle platformer playable by one-two players. Control each character using the WASD and the Arrow Keys, and navigate your way to the end of the cave. 

Tilemap used was made by Adam Saltsman - https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas
